Assert decay function and parameter values

Source: R/utils.R
assert_decay_function.Rd

Assert decay function and parameter values

assert_decay_function(decay_function, decay_value)

Arguments

decay_function

Name of decay function.

decay_value

Value of decay parameter.

Value

A list with the validated decay function and parameter value.

See also

Other support functions: assert_breakdown_stat(), assert_points_input(), check_connection(), fileurl_from_metadata(), get_all_od_combinations(), posix_to_string(), select_mode(), set_max_lts(), set_max_rides(), set_max_street_time(), set_n_threads(), set_progress(), set_speed(), set_suboptimal_minutes(), set_verbose(), stop_r5()
